Sensational South Africa
Dear [fname],
When it comes to African destinations, little tickle the senses quite like South Africa.
From the mighty Table Mountain, wide open romantic stretches of beach, the Big 5 and pulse racing adventures – it’s a world in one. Not to mention the hotels and lodges are superior.
This month we look at what makes South Africa such a great place to travel to and why you should take advantage of last minute bookings (and weakening South Africa exchange rate) – or add it to your bucket list for 2016.
We also have plenty of good news to share. See below, I’m sure it will leave you inspired.
~ Marcus Brain, Safari365 founder ~
